thread.title: If You Shop Online, You Probably Evade This Tax

author: Jo Craven McGinty
title: If You Shop Online, You Probably Evade This Tax
text:
Are you a tax cheat?
If you shop online, there’s a good chance you have evaded taxes that perhaps you didn’t even know were due.
Thanks to a U.S. Supreme Court decision that predates the boom in e-commerce, retailers with no physical presence in a state aren’t required to collect its sales tax.
...
